common.paragraph1: Our company provides a full cycle of logistics services with an individual approach to each client. We guarantee transparency of processes, timely delivery and competitive prices.
common.paragraph2: An experienced team of specialists will help you choose the optimal solution for your needs and ensure cargo escort at all stages of transportation.

cases.title: Cases

cases.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video.

auto-1.title: International equipment transportation
auto-1.description: Delivery of industrial equipment from China to Kazakhstan
auto-1.details: Organized full cycle delivery of industrial equipment from Shanghai to Almaty. Included customs clearance, insurance and cargo escort.

auto-2.title: Consolidated cargo transportation
auto-2.description: Consolidation and delivery of small batches from different senders
auto-2.details: Successfully consolidated 8 small batches from different senders into one container. Optimized route and reduced cost for clients.

rail-1.title: Kazakhstan-Russia container train
rail-1.details: Organized regular container transportation on Shanghai-Moscow route via Trans-Siberian Railway. Travel time: 14 days.

rail-2.title: Oversized equipment transportation
rail-2.description: Delivery of large equipment for oil and gas industry
rail-2.details: Special transportation of oversized equipment for oil and gas industry. Developed special route considering dimensions.

multimodal-1.title: Combined delivery from China
multimodal-1.details: Organized complex multimodal transportation: by sea from Shanghai to Vladivostok, then by railway to Yekaterinburg, and by road to destination.

project-1.title: Construction equipment transportation
project-1.details: Special transportation of construction equipment for major infrastructure project. Included route development, permits and escort.

container-1.title: Regular container transportation
container-1.details: Organized regular container transportation between Chinese and Russian ports. Stable schedule and competitive prices.

dangerous-1.title: Chemical substances transportation
dangerous-1.description: Safe transportation of dangerous chemical materials
dangerous-1.details: Special transportation of dangerous chemical substances with compliance to all international safety standards. Included special packaging and escort.

rail-3.title: Car transportation by railway
rail-3.description: Mass transportation of passenger cars from China
rail-3.details: Organized transportation of batch of 50 passenger cars from China to Russia. Special car-carrying wagons ensured transportation safety.

auto-3.title: Express delivery of urgent cargo
auto-3.details: Completed urgent delivery of critically important equipment for oil refinery. Travel time: 72 hours instead of standard 7 days.

about.title: About company
about.missionDescription1: VELTA is smart international logistics focused on China, CIS, Turkey and Europe. The company builds a system destined for success: automation, transparency, speed and human approach.
about.missionDescription2: VELTA Trans mission is to connect businesses and countries through reliable transport solutions, becoming a symbol of quality, style and partnership. Under the leadership of a strong leader, the company creates not just a service, but a space for confident growth of its clients and team.
about.missionDescription3: VELTA Trans is precise calculation, thoughtful strategy and powerful momentum that contributes to the success and work of your business.
about.valuesDescription: Principles that guide us in our work
